footer.about: The official website of the Municipality of Bar Elias, serving our citizens and visitors with municipal services, news, and community resources.

about.title: About Bar Elias Municipality
about.subtitle: The Municipality of Bar Elias is dedicated to serving our community and creating a thriving, sustainable environment for all residents and visitors of our beautiful town in the Bekaa Valley.

history.title: Our History
history.heading: A Rich Heritage of Community Service
history.intro: Since its establishment, Bar Elias Municipality has been at the heart of local governance and community development.
history.paragraph1: Founded in 1962, the municipality has grown from a small administrative body to a comprehensive local government organization providing a wide range of services to our growing population. Throughout our history, we have remained committed to transparency, efficiency, and public service.
history.paragraph2: Over the decades, we have witnessed significant growth and transformation in our town, adapting our services and infrastructure to meet the evolving needs of our community while preserving our cultural heritage and natural resources.

mission.title: Our Mission & Vision
mission.subtitle: Guiding principles that drive our work and shape our future
mission.missionText: To provide high-quality municipal services that enhance the quality of life for all residents through effective governance, infrastructure development, and community engagement. We are committed to fiscal responsibility, environmental sustainability, and inclusive growth that preserves our town's unique character and cultural heritage.
mission.visionText: To transform Bar Elias into a model town that balances urban development with environmental conservation, creating a sustainable community where citizens enjoy a high quality of life, robust economic opportunities, and a strong sense of social cohesion. We envision Bar Elias as a regional leader in innovative municipal governance and civic engagement.

structure.title: Organizational Chart
structure.heading: Municipal Structure
structure.subtitle: Our municipal government is structured to effectively serve the needs of our community

location.title: Our Location
location.heading: Administrative Boundaries
location.subtitle: Bar Elias is located in the fertile Bekaa Valley, serving numerous villages and communities in the region

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with the Municipality of Bar Elias. We're here to assist you with any questions, concerns, or feedback.

form.subject: Subject

accessibility.title: Accessibility Statement
accessibility.subtitle: Our commitment to digital inclusion
accessibility.intro: The Municipality of Bar Elias is committed to ensuring that our website is accessible to everyone, including people with disabilities. We strive to adhere to international best practices and Lebanese accessibility laws to provide an inclusive online experience.

tool.title: Try Our Accessibility Tool
tool.description: Click the "A" button in the bottom right corner of your screen to access our accessibility tool. You can adjust text size, contrast, and other settings to make this website more accessible to your needs.

accessibility.thankyou: Thank you for helping us make the Municipality of Bar Elias website accessible to all!
